tha-ap32:0.3_0: Then he used to be so pretty,
tha-ap32:1.4_0: like a seed in the ag.
tha-ap32:10.3_0: Delighted five hundred things have been spoken;
tha-ap32:11.1_0: The third sub-chapter on Subhūti is finished.
tha-ap32:2.4_0: for the sake of the Teacher, for the sake of compared to the Teacher.
tha-ap32:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap32:4.1_0: With seven eons of the eon
tha-ap32:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap32:5.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap32:5.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap32:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
